text: [Music]
competitive manufacturers and industrial
companies are always looking for ways to
optimize business operations and reduce
costs all while maintaining the highest
levels of security improving your
operations overall equipment
effectiveness is a constant challenge
innovative industrial companies are
taking advantage of new cloud
technologies to integrate multiple data
sources across different equipment and
analyze that data to improve
productivity uptime and quality
the cloud can also provide the
end-to-end visibility today's supply
chains need to track and trace their
entire production process with
unprecedented efficiency aws is the
leading cloud provider to achieve these
goals aws has unmatched experience in
industrial operations amazon fulfillment
centers are factories in and of
themselves distributing billions of
products using cutting edge automation
iot machine learning ai and robotics all
with aws at their core with aws and our
extensive network of aws partners you
too can transform your operations with
the most comprehensive and advanced set
of cloud solutions available today aws
helps companies simplify the connection
between disparate equipment data sources
across multiple factories with services
like aws iot core which can extract all
of your machine data into a low-cost
amazon simple storage service amazon s3
data lake for a single source of truth
services like aws iot sitewise help
collect organize and analyze data from
industrial equipment at scale to unlock
new efficiency gains using your valuable
operational data once your data is
centralized you can leverage machine
learning services like amazon sagemaker
to build train and deploy machine
learning models to optimize your
operations deploy these models via aws
iot green grass at the edge to minimize
latency and make real-time production
adjustments for maximum efficiency
end-to-end services like amazon monotron
can help you detect abnormal machine
behavior to enable predictive
maintenance without any development work
or ml experience required at aws
customer trust is our top priority as a
provider for security sensitive
industries like financial services
health healthcare and government aws
offers strong encryption for your
content in transit and at rest as well
as the option to manage your own
encryption keys so you can not only
trust aws to protect your intellectual
property you can choose how it is
secured best of all as the world's
largest cloud provider our massive scale
allows seamless connectivity across all
regions with significantly lower costs
than on-premises equipment and with aws
you pay only for the individual services
you need for as long as you use them
without the long-term contracts or
complex licensing that may be required
by other providers this means you can
stay competitive by focusing on
producing the best quality product at
the lowest cost not on the
infrastructure needed to make it happen
help accelerate your digital
transformation with a cloud provider
that truly understands manufacturing and
industrial operations aws
[Music]
